name: Vyrda the Hollow
background: Once a noble daughter. Burned alive and returned with the gift of sight.

quirks: whispers names of the dead mid-sentence

long_term_goals: Unlock the full web of prophecy through ritual blood rites
Replace the current Hollow Kin leader with a seer of her own choosing
Manipulate key figures into fulfilling fragments of a long-lost fate
known_allies: An unnamed spirit that whispers during visions
known_rivals: Any cleric of the Sun-Order Church
secret_traumas: Still hears her own screams from the fire that took her body
Fears her visions are seeded lies planted by something inhuman
